welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guadalupe, the charming and vibrant city of Sao Tome and Principe! Get ready to discover the rich culture, stunning nature, and warm hospitality this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Guadalupe has to offer."
